archived.description: Is the release archived or not. Default: `false`

default_quantity.description: The default number of tickets selected for this release on the event page. Default: `0`

description.description: A statement or tag line describing the event

enable_super_combo_summary.description: For combo releases only. Include a summary of a combo in the order summary or not. Default: `true`

end_at.description: The time when the release will go off sale.

has_success_message.description: Display the custom success message or not. Default: `false`

max_tickets_per_person.description: The maximum number of tickets per registration.

min_tickets_per_person.description: The minimum number of tickets per registration.

not_a_ticket.description: Disable issuing of PDF/Apple Wallet tickets or not. For example if this release is for merchandise rather than an actual ticket. Default `false`

position.description: The position of the release in the list of all releases for the event.

question_ids.description: An array of the IDs of `Questions` attached to the release. The order of the IDs represents the order in which the questions will be asked.

request_company_name.description: Do registrations which include this release require a company name.

request_vat_number.description: Do registrations which include this release require a VAT number.

require_billing_address.description: Do registrations which include this release require a billing address.

require_email.description: Do tickets for this release require an email. Default: `true`

require_name.description: Do tickets for this release require a name. Default: `false`

secret.description: Is it only accessible via a secret link or is it visible to everyone on the event page. Default: `false`

start_at.description: The time when the release will go on sale.

success_message.description: A custom message to be displayed to customers after a successful order of this release.

waiting_list_enabled_during_sold_out.description: Enable waiting list when this release sells out or not. Default: `false`
